resources.string: This game works by tilting the device. Touching the screen does nothing during gameplay.
Tilt the device to the orientation you wish to play in.
After pressing play, calibrate the game by using the arrows to move the fish inside the circle.
Objective: Catch as many fish as possible before the ship reaches the other side.
Tilt device to move the hook.
Return hooked fish to the boat to increase score.
Avoid sharks. They will eat all the current fish on your hook.
Be conscious of the ships position.
